          <section aria-label="CPA Stories &amp; Opportunities" class="feature-mod" role="region">
           <h2 class="mod-title" id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_0_h2">
            CPA Stories &amp; Opportunities
           </h2>
           <div class="gridset">
            <article class="grid span4">
             <div class="mod-link">
              <a href="/en/business-and-accounting-resources/financial-and-non-financial-reporting/international-financial-reporting-standards-ifrs/publications/accounting-for-cryptocurrencies-under-ifrs" id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_0_rptHighlights_hypLink_0">
               <img alt="Bitcoin logo on iphone sitting among pile of Bitcoins, with digital circuits overlaid" height="514" src="/-/media/site/operational/rg-research-guidance-and-support/images/01713-rg.jpg?h=514&amp;la=en&amp;w=800&amp;hash=DA5B33BA73918334172F785717F319ED32BCE07C" width="800"/>
               <br/>
               <h3>
                Accounting for cryptocurrencies under IFRS
               </h3>
              </a>
             </div>
             <p>
              Learn about cryptocurrencies and the primary issues involved in accounting for them under International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS).
             </p>
            </article>
            <article class="grid span4">
             <div class="mod-link">
              <a href="/en/business-and-accounting-resources/management-accounting/organizational-performance-measurement/publications/management-accounting-guidelines-mags" id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_0_rptHighlights_hypLink_1">
               <img alt="finger touching virtual global, made up of dots of light" height="514" src="/-/media/site/operational/rg-research-guidance-and-support/images/01740-rg.jpg?h=514&amp;la=en&amp;w=800&amp;hash=AF5248E8419849E70F644B0E66478EF1CF2E4B13" width="800"/>
               <br/>
               <h3>
                Management accounting guidelines (MAGs)
               </h3>
              </a>
             </div>
             <p>
              CPAs play a pivotal and crucial role in creating resilient, adaptive, innovative and sustainable enterprises (RAISE). MAGs will prepare CPAs to address day-to-day business issues as well as critical disrupters that influence their decision-making processes.
             </p>
            </article>
            <article class="grid span4">
             <div class="mod-link">
              <a href="/en/the-cpa-profession/financial-literacy/financial-literacy-education/request-a-session-in-your-community" id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_0_rptHighlights_hypLink_2">
               <img alt="Person typing on a laptop" height="514" src="/-/media/site/operational/cc-corporate-citizenship/images/00302-cc.jpg?h=514&amp;la=en&amp;w=800&amp;hash=958DE20BF840DD1FB6B96EC0F368E090E322FD7B" width="800"/>
               <br/>
               <h3>
                Request a financial literacy session
               </h3>
              </a>
             </div>
             <p>
              Learn more about our various financial literacy sessions and register.
             </p>
            </article>
           </div>
          </section>

          <section aria-label="Highlights" class="feature mod" role="region">
           <h2 class="mod-title" id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_2_h2">
            Highlights
           </h2>
           <div class="gridset">
            <article class="grid span4">
             <div class="mod-link">
              <a href="/en/career-and-professional-development/webinars/core-areas/financial-and-non-financial-reporting/ifrs/livestream-ifrs-discussion-group-june-2018" id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_2_rptHighlights_hypLink_0">
               <br/>
               <h3>
                Livestream: IFRS discussion group June 2018
               </h3>
              </a>
             </div>
             <p>
              <span class="article-date">
               This event has multiple dates and locations. See event details for more information.
              </span>
             </p>
             <p>
              Attend the IFRS Discussion Group meeting from anywhere in the world. Virtual observers will be able to see and hear the discussion along with those attending in person.
             </p>
            </article>
            <article class="grid span4">
             <div class="mod-link">
              <a href="/en/career-and-professional-development/conferences/2018/october/the-one-national-conference-2018" id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_2_rptHighlights_hypLink_1">
               <br/>
               <h3>
                The ONE national conference 2018
               </h3>
              </a>
             </div>
             <p>
              <span class="article-date">
               October 1, 2018
              </span>
             </p>
             <p>
              The ONE is Canada’s must-attend, multi-track CPA event of the year. Stay at the top of your game with future-focused sessions, thought-provoking keynotes, prime networking opportunities and a first-class exhibition floor.
             </p>
            </article>
            <article class="grid span4">
             <div class="mod-link">
              <a href="/en/career-and-professional-development/conferences/2018/october/commodity-tax-symposium-2018" id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_2_rptHighlights_hypLink_2">
               <br/>
               <h3>
                Commodity tax symposium 2018
               </h3>
              </a>
             </div>
             <p>
              <span class="article-date">
               October 15, 2018
              </span>
             </p>
             <p>
              Stay up-to-date on critical indirect tax issues and network with other indirect tax professionals at Canada’s largest and longest-running indirect tax event.
             </p>
            </article>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section aria-label="CPA News" class="feature-mod" role="region">
           <h2 class="mod-title" id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_3_h2">
            CPA News
           </h2>
           <div class="gridset">
            <article class="grid span4">
             <div class="mod-link">
              <a href="/en/members-area/profession-news/2018/may/five-years-post-unification" id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_3_rptHighlights_hypLink_0">
               <br/>
               <h3>
                Five years post-unification
               </h3>
              </a>
             </div>
             <p>
              <span class="article-date">
               May 31, 2018
              </span>
             </p>
             <p>
              Hear from Joy Thomas, president and CEO of CPA Canada, along with a diverse group of CPAs, as we mark our five-year anniversary and look at the future of the profession.
             </p>
            </article>
            <article class="grid span4">
             <div class="mod-link">
              <a href="/en/members-area/profession-news/2018/june/six-reasons-cpas-make-great-leaders" id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_3_rptHighlights_hypLink_1">
               <br/>
               <h3>
                6 reasons why CPAs make great leaders
               </h3>
              </a>
             </div>
             <p>
              <span class="article-date">
               June 6, 2018
              </span>
             </p>
             <p>
              What separates the leaders from the followers—or even the managers? Find out what makes CPAs better bosses than most.
             </p>
            </article>
            <article class="grid span4">
             <div class="mod-link">
              <a href="/en/career-and-professional-development/conferences/2018/november/world-congress-of-accountants-2018" id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_3_rptHighlights_hypLink_2">
               <br/>
               <h3>
                World congress of accountants 2018
               </h3>
              </a>
             </div>
             <p>
              <span class="article-date">
               November 5, 2018
              </span>
             </p>
             <p>
              Join finance and business professionals from around the world to take on the global challenges of change and disruption, and build a road map for the profession.
             </p>
            </article>
